languages.text: "Огонь веры пылает в твоей душе, сжигая тебя изнутри. Поддашься ему однажды — и рискуешь сгореть сам{mf||а}".
"The fire of faith burns bright in your soul, burning you from within. You risk losing yourself if you ever succumb to it."
languages.original_text: "Огонь веры пылает в твоей душе, сжигая тебя изнутри. Поддашься ему однажды — и рискуешь сгореть сам{mf||а}".

traits.locale_text: "The fires of faith burns bright in your soul, burning you alive. You risk losing yourself if you ever succumb to it."
"The fires of faith burns bright in your soul, burning you alive. You risk losing yourself if you ever succumb to it."
"The fire of faith burns bright in your soul, burning you from within. You risk losing yourself if you ever succumb to it."
"The fire of faith burns bright in your soul, burning you from within. You risk losing yourself if you ever succumb to it."
"The fire of faith burns bright in your soul, burning you from within. You risk losing yourself if you ever succumb to it."

languages.text: “信仰的烈火在你的心中熊熊燃烧，迟早会烧尽你的灵魂。一味屈从于狂热只会让你失去自我。”
languages.original_text: "The fire of faith burns bright in your soul, burning you from within. You risk losing yourself if you ever succumb to it."

traits.locale_text: “信仰的烈火在你的心中熊熊燃烧，迟早会烧尽你的灵魂。一味屈从于狂热只会让你失去自我。”

languages.text: «El fuego de la fe arde con tanta intensidad en su alma que le quema por dentro. Corre el riesgo de perderse entre sus llamas si alguna vez sucumbe a él».
languages.original_text: "The fire of faith burns bright in your soul, burning you from within. You risk losing yourself if you ever succumb to it."

traits.locale_text: «El fuego de la fe arde con tanta intensidad en su alma que le quema por dentro. Corre el riesgo de perderse entre sus llamas si alguna vez sucumbe a él».

languages.text: « La flamme de la foi brûle dans votre âme et vous consume de l'intérieur. Si vous y succombez, vous pourriez bien vous y perdre. »
languages.original_text: "The fire of faith burns bright in your soul, burning you from within. You risk losing yourself if you ever succumb to it."

traits.locale_text: « La flamme de la foi brûle dans votre âme et vous consume de l'intérieur. Si vous y succombez, vous pourriez bien vous y perdre. »

languages.text: "Das Feuer des Glaubens brennt lodernd in Eurer Seele und verbrennt Euch von innen. Wenn Ihr ihm je nachgebt, droht Ihr Euch selbst zu verlieren."
languages.original_text: "The fire of faith burns bright in your soul, burning you from within. You risk losing yourself if you ever succumb to it."

traits.locale_text: "Das Feuer des Glaubens brennt lodernd in Eurer Seele und verbrennt Euch von innen. Wenn Ihr ihm je nachgebt, droht Ihr Euch selbst zu verlieren."

languages.text: 「信仰の炎はお前の魂の中で輝いていて、内側からお前を焼き尽くすだろう。もしその炎に屈するようなことがあれば、自分自身を失う危険がある」
languages.original_text: "The fire of faith burns bright in your soul, burning you from within. You risk losing yourself if you ever succumb to it."

traits.locale_text: 「信仰の炎はお前の魂の中で輝いていて、内側からお前を焼き尽くすだろう。もしその炎に屈するようなことがあれば、自分自身を失う危険がある」

languages.text: "İnancın yangını ruhunda parlıyor, seni içten içe yakıyor. Ona boyun eğersen kendini kaybedebilirsin."
languages.original_text: "The fire of faith burns bright in your soul, burning you from within. You risk losing yourself if you ever succumb to it."

traits.locale_text: "İnancın yangını ruhunda parlıyor, seni içten içe yakıyor. Ona boyun eğersen kendini kaybedebilirsin."
